name: A King Speaking to a Flock of Doves
description: A King Speaking to a Flock of Doves; Unknown; Trier (probably), Germany; third quarter of 15th century; Pen and black ink and colored washes on paper; Leaf: 28.7 x 20.6 cm (11 5/16 x 8 1/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 1, fol. 8; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: A King Speaking to a Flock of Doves
medium: Pen and black ink and colored washes on paper
